General.Name: Israel China Biotechnology (ICB) Ltd
General.Description: Silver Castle Holdings Ltd operates as a healthcare investment company. It invests in companies in the biomedical field in Israel. The company was formerly known as Israel China Biotechnology (ICB) Ltd and changed its name to Silver Castle Holdings Ltd in February 2022. Silver Castle Holdings Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

2.Name: Dr. Amir  Beker
2.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of BSP Medical Inc.
